Cheers,

Hi Laurent,

Thanks for putting the new code up. I downloaded and converted the projects to Silverlight 4 (as you mentioned, they were already updated for VS2010). There were a couple of issue. First the GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Test suite failed to complete. I also created a test app (SL4) that attempted to use EventToCommand. This all compiled fine but the command (on MouseEnter of a TextBox) never fired. I have all the prerequisites. I'd appreciate any advise you may have on this.

Thanks,
